sentences.en: A tumor originating in the neuroglia of the brain or spinal cord.
sentences.cn: 神经胶质瘤脑神经或脊神经束上产生的肿瘤.

sentences.en: An average of 4 - spinal cord decompression was performed on all 30 patients.
sentences.cn: 所有30名患者均接受平均4个节段的脊髓减压.

sentences.en: Cervical spinal cord injury; High paraplegia; Diabetes insipidus; Care.
sentences.cn: 颈髓损伤; 高位截瘫; 尿崩症; 护理.

sentences.en: How does a ruptured disk affect the spinal cord?
sentences.cn: 突出的椎间盘是怎样影响脊髓的?

sentences.en: I must provide security for Joe's 18 - inch spinal cord.
sentences.cn: 我必须为乔的那个18英寸的脊髓提供安全保护.

sentences.en: Major reason of paraplegia after trauma is injury of spinal cord.
sentences.cn: 脊髓损伤是外伤后致残的主要原因.

sentences.en: Method and Results 31 patients under para spinal nerve block were observed.
sentences.cn: 方法对31例疼痛患者施行椎旁神经阻滞疗法,观察其效果.

sentences.en: Methods Spinal bifida and tethered cord syndrome are congenital malformations.
sentences.cn: 方法　脊柱裂与脊髓栓系综合征是一种先天性疾病.

sentences.en: Neurosyphilis : is an infection of the brain or spinal cord.
sentences.cn: 神经性 梅毒 是一种脑部或脊髓感染.

sentences.en: Objective. To present the treatment guideline for spinal diseases in pregnant women.
sentences.cn: 研究目的: 引入一种针对妊娠期妇女发生脊柱疾病的治疗准则.

sentences.en: Solid massage for the abdomen, spinal chord and thigh muscle.
sentences.cn: 按摩腹部, 脊椎和大腿肌肉.

sentences.en: Spinal anesthesia results from the infection of a local anesthetic into the cerebrospinal fluid.
sentences.cn: 脊椎麻醉将局麻药注入脑脊液.

sentences.en: The rest were diagnosed respectively as harelip, spinal bifida and hernia of brin.
sentences.cn: 其余3例分别经胎儿镜确诊为唇裂 、 脊柱裂及脑疝.

sentences.en: This movement lengthens your spine and tones the spinal nerves.
sentences.cn: 这一动作舒展脊椎，使脊神经更加强健。

sentences.en: Vertebra is one of the bones of the backbone or spinal column.
sentences.cn: 脊椎骨是腰背骨或脊柱骨之ㄧ种骨头.
